title.rendered: Maximize the Value of Your Business with Michael Sirpilla of Encap33.com Part 1

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 38:44 — 35.5MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 38:44 — 35.5MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Michael Sirpilla is the co-founder of Encap33 an FBA Aggregator and Private Equity firm with a unique strategy of helping Amazon businesses get a premium multiple for their businesses.

He’s going to talk about selling your business while it’s thriving and not wait until you get tired of your business.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • That you actually need to leave the business at the best point
  • The difference between sellability vs value
  • How to increase business value
  • How much the business really need you in the day to day
  • What are other best practices for increasing value
  • Solving Pain points for Amazon sellers
